original_text:
The field commander said to them, “Tell Hezekiah:
“‘This is what the great king, the king of Assyria, says: On what are you basing this confidence of yours?
korean_text: 랍사게가 그들에게 이르되 너희는 히스기야에게 말하라 대왕 앗수르 왕의 말씀이 네가 의뢰하는 이 의뢰가 무엇이냐

sentences.original_text: The field commander said to them
This is what the great king says
On what are you basing this confidence of yours
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 무엇에 이 자신감을 두고 있는가
